rukus.text: Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:“Nandao zhenzhu paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo dadishang you xuduo tianshen anran buxing, name wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshen qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de purenmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.”

Zhenzhu yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian zhenzhu yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?”§
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Chuangzaole tiandi wanwu de zhenzhu neng chuangzao xiang tamen nayang de ren, bing neng wei tamen queding yige hao wu keyi de qixian, bu yi de renmen zhi yuan buxin
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo wo de zhu de enhui de kucang gui nimen guanli, name, nimen biding yinwei pa kaizhi er kouliu ta de enhui. Ren shi linse de.”
